description: Atlanta police officers are responding to a report of a suspicious package on Peachtree Street downt...
title: Atlanta police investigating another suspicious package downtown
title_page: Atlanta police investigating another suspicious package downtown
text:
Atlanta police officers are responding to a report of a suspicious package on Peachtree Street downtown, officials said, the third such call in three days.
Portions of Peachtree Center at 231 Peachtree St. have been evacuated “as a precaution,” police spokeswoman Officer Lisa Bender said in a statement.
SWAT teams were called to the scene.
APD ALERT: Officers are responding to a report of a suspicious package at 231 Peachtree St. NE. Portions of Peachtree Center Mall have been evacuated as a precaution. International Blvd. NE between Peachtree Center Ave. NE and Peachtree St. NE is currently closed. #ATLTraffic — Atlanta Police Dept (@Atlanta_Police) October 30, 2018
International Boulevard between Peachtree Center Avenue and Peachtree Street is closed as crews investigate, police said.
The probe comes one day after a parcel at an Atlanta post office was investigated by the FBI in connection with the more than a dozen packaged bombs that were sent around the country over the past week.
Atlanta police also investigated a suspicious package at the Atlanta airport on Sunday that was deemed to be harmless.
In other news:
